title: Canvas

Fills the width and height boundaries and crops any excess image data.
The resulting image will match the width and height constraints without scaling the image.

title: Fill

might be visible if the required proportions are different than the original ones.

title: WixUpload
content: Client to upload media to the Wix Media Platform

title: uploadFromFile
subtitle: module:WixUpload.AudioUploader
content: Uploads an audio file to the Wix Media Platform. Accepts callbacks, or returns a promise. If callbacks are not supplied, a Promise is returned

title: uploadFromB64
subtitle: module:WixUpload.ImageUploader
content: Uploads a base64 encoded image to the Wix Media Platform. Accepts callbacks, or returns a promise. If callbacks are not supplied, a Promise is returned

title: uploadFromFile
subtitle: module:WixUpload.ImageUploader
content: Uploads an image to the Wix Media Platform. Accepts callbacks, or returns a promise. If callbacks are not supplied, a Promise is returned

title: uploadFromFile
subtitle: module:WixUpload.VideoUploader
content: Uploads a video file to the Wix Media Platform. Accepts callbacks, or returns a promise. If callbacks are not supplied, a Promise is returned
